DOC.brief_summary: FlowMet study `` sub-study '' PregMet study ( registered 2005 ) . The aim FlowMet study register possible effect metformin blood flow uterine artery pregnant PCOS woman . The participant examine ultrasound Doppler gestational week 10-13 : 1. 3h first tablet intake metformin/placebo 2. 10-14 day inclusion trial 3. blood flow umbilical artery fetal cerebral artery gestational week 24 .
DOC.brief_title: Uterine Artery Blood Flow Pregnant Women With PCOS Treated With Metformin
DOC.criteria: Same PregMet study . As study substudy/extended study PregMet study , ONLY include PregMet study ( NCT00159536 ) participate . Same PregMet study
